about_the_game:
Welcome to your new home! Only it's a foreboding expanse shrouded in mystery and whispered tales of unspeakable horrors.

Cthulhu valley is a cozy farming game, you find yourself unexpectedly inheriting the cursed estate of Nahum Farm, a decaying homestead nestled within the shadowy embrace of ancient woods.

Features


  • Transform this cursed landscape into a farm! Raise animals, grow carrots or plant unspeakable seeds and see what twisted monstrosity they become!
  • Become part of the community. Meet the locals, give them gifts ... or maybe sacrifice them!
  • Learn to cook. Who doesn't like a Deep Fried Deep One?

Delve into forgotten journals, decipher cryptic symbols, uncover hidden chambers and appease the dark gods.

Or you can just grow some carrots. No pressure.

name: Cthulhu Valley

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64 bit versions only
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs

short_description: You've inherited your grandfather's old farm plot. Unfortunately, it's a cursed hellscape seeped in eldritch dread. Harvest demonic plants. Find the Cooking Book of The Dead. Sacrifice your friends. Or just grow carrots. Cthulhu can wait, he has always been waiting.
